dtliExcerpt: Robert Hastie’s direction and Jenny Arnold’s frenetic choreography ensure a well-oiled engine of comedic and dramatic moving parts amid the music.
bwwExcerpt: Operation Mincemeat is a cup of British comedy, sometimes with drawn-out humor to a fault — not for every American. But it also captures the Hollywood hagiographic, the self-deprecating, the ironic, and the tragic that will make you gasp.

keyPhrases.quote: sometimes with drawn-out humor to a fault — not for every American
well-oiled engine of comedic and dramatic moving parts
